name: dungeon-together
description: A multiplayer WebGL HTML5 dungeon game

scripts.build: npm run build:release & npm run build:stage & npm run build:test
scripts.build:release: npm run build:release:client & npm run build:release:server & npm run build:release:server
scripts.build:release:client: npm run build:release:rollup && rollup --config build/release/bin/rollup/release.js && mkdirp build/release/artifacts/terser && terser build/release/artifacts/rollup/client.js --compress --mangle --beautify --output build/release/artifacts/terser/client.js && mkdirp build/release/client && ncp build/release/artifacts/terser/client.js build/release/client/index.js
scripts.build:stage: npm run build:stage:client & npm run build:stage:server & npm run build:stage:server
scripts.build:stage:client: npm run build:stage:rollup && rollup --config build/stage/bin/rollup/stage.js && mkdirp build/stage/artifacts/terser && terser build/stage/artifacts/rollup/client.js --compress --mangle --beautify --output build/stage/artifacts/terser/client.js && mkdirp build/stage/client && ncp build/stage/artifacts/terser/client.js build/stage/client/index.js
scripts.build:test: npm run build:test:client & npm run build:test:rollup & npm run build:test:server
scripts.codacy: npm run coverage && cross-cat coverage/lcov.info | codacy-coverage
scripts.junit: npm run build && mocha test --reporter mocha-junit-reporter

author: cpuabuse.com
